# JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy.throw

**Case**

The strategy that throws an error upon encoding an exceptional floating-point value.

## Declaration

```swift
case `throw`
```

## Exceptional Values

- **JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy.convertToString(positiveInfinity:negativeInfinity:nan:)**: The strategy that encodes exceptional floating-point values from a specified string representation.

items.description: The strategy that encodes exceptional floating-point values from a specified string representation.
